description:
Jason had that "deer caught in the headlights" thing at first. He wasn't sure what to make of what was going on.
As I was speaking with him, he kept looking at the ground and laughing nervously. He had his shirt off and was flexing his pecs involuntarily. Nervous habit, maybe.
Jason is kind of hard to read, but I'm guessing that he opens up more as you get to know him. I kind of get the feeling that he might be into guys, so we'll see...
He plays a lot of beach volleyball and he just completed his dive certification.
"I love seeing the fish and all the wildlife down there," he said with a big smile. It's obvious he loves it.
He described what he was looking for in a potential partner and he was very gender-neutral about it...
"They would have to be an outdoors person so they can keep up with me."
The thing I liked best about Jason was his big, broad chest. Really sexy!
And, of course, there was the big, white load he dumped on a pillow.
"That's a few days buildup!" he said.
title: Jason
